thread.title: FOOTBALL: Hart breaks school record in Morrice win
thread.title_full: FOOTBALL: Hart breaks school record in Morrice win

author: CHRIS HAULER Argus-Press Sports Writer
title: FOOTBALL: Hart breaks school record in Morrice win
text:
Argus-Press Photo/Chris Hauler Jake Rivers 
JAKE RIVERS (28) GAINS a first down for Morrice in the first quarter Friday against Kinde-North Huron. Argus-Press Photo/Chris Hauler 
LUKE BINDSCHATEL (2) RUNS the ball for Morrice in the third quarter. Argus-Press Photo/Chris Hauler 
Brennan Wright (22) of Morrice runs against Kinde-North Huron Friday at Morrice Argus-Press Photo/Chris Hauler 
TANNER ATKINSON (6) HAULS in a touchdown in the second quarter against North Huron. Posted: Saturday, October 10, 2015 5:00 am FOOTBALL: Hart breaks school record in Morrice win By CHRIS HAULER Argus-Press Sports Writer The Argus-Press | 0 comments 
MORRICE — It was only fitting that Nick Hart broke Morrice’s single-game touchdown record on a pass to Jake Rivers in Friday’s 77-6 win over Kinde-North Huron. 
With 10:01 remaining in the second quarter, Hart found Rivers wide open for a 17-yard touchdown pass to give Morrice a 46-0 lead. Hart finished 9-for-10 for 166 yards and a school-record six touchdown passes — three of them to Rivers. kAm#:G6CD 2?5 w2CE 2C6 8@@5 7C:6?5D 2?5 92G6 A=2J65 7@@E32== E@86E96C 7@C J62CD]k^Am kAm“(6’G6 366? >2<:?8 E92E 4@??64E:@?
